tool.name: groups
tool.command:
parsec groups create_group "$group_name"
#for $rep in $repeat_user_ids: --user_ids "$rep.user_ids" #end for #for $rep in $repeat_role_ids: --role_ids "$rep.role_ids" #end for
| jq -S . > $results

param.name: group_name
param.label: group_name
param.help: A name for the new group

param.name: user_ids
param.label: user_ids
param.help: A list of encoded user IDs to add to the new group

param.name: role_ids
param.label: role_ids
param.help: A list of encoded role IDs to add to the new group
